articles.title: Acknowledgements
articles.contents:
This workshop has been given multiple times.
Thank you to PDX-R for hosting the workshop multiple times.
Thank you to Jessica Minnier who contributed and taught this workshop with me for WNAR2019.
Thank you to BioData Club for the latest version of the workshop, including:
Pierrette Lo
Darâ€™ya Pozhidayeva
Eric Leung
Marijane White
Eric Earl
Thank you to Vivian Peng, for inspiring the layout for the slides.
Slides done in {xaringan} with {flair} and {xaringanExtra}.
